name: Far Darrig
skill: Nature +4, Animal Handling +6, Medicine +6, Perception +6, Survival +6

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The far darrig's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
Constant: magic weapon (antler glaive only), speak with animals
At will: calm emotions, charm animal (as charm person but affects beasts only), cure wounds, detect poison and disease, water breathing, water walk
3/day each: barkskin, conjure woodland beings, hold animal (as hold person but affects beasts only), jump, longstrider
1/day each: commune with nature, freedom of movement, nondetection, tree stride

action.name: Multiattack
text: The far darrig makes four antler glaive attacks.

action.name: Antler Glaive
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage and the target must make a successful DC 13 Strength saving throw or either be disarmed or fall prone; the attacking far darrig chooses which effect occurs.

action.name: Enchanted Glaive Maneuvers
text: A far darrig can magically extend or shrink its antler glaive as a bonus action to give it either a 10-foot or 5-foot reach.
